name: Emerging Markets Government Bond Series E
description: Emerging Markets Government Bond Series E provides exposure to high-growth economies with a competitive 6.75% yield. Backed by stable emerging market sovereigns with BBB- ratings, this bond offers enhanced returns for investors seeking diversification beyond developed markets. Ideal for investors with higher risk tolerance looking for long-term capital appreciation and income generation from developing economies.
risks: Higher credit risk than developed market bonds
Currency fluctuation and exchange rate risk
targetInvestors: Growth-oriented investors with higher risk tolerance
Sophisticated investors comfortable with EM exposure
demandTrend: Moderate demand from sophisticated investors seeking emerging market exposure
